alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hazel Green, or 10 miles northwest of Meridianville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Elkwood, Belleview, Skinem, Molino, Toney, Coldwater and Fisk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
